comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown in log file and tomcat start console when deploy birt in 
Tomcat4.1.31.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Copy birt.war from birt runtime package to tomcat webapp directory.
2. Start tomcat
3. Type http://hostname:8080/birt/index.jsp
4. Click to link to the sample report

Result:
See attached two files.
One is meta.log in the bin directory of tomcat.
The other is Tomcat startup console.
However, the report displayed correctly.

Created an attachment (id=29754)
tomcat startup console
Using new web viewer. I can not re-procude this issue. Please verify.

The exception still throws out in meta.log but not in Tomcat startup console.
I tried this in build 20051223.

The exeception is casued by missing an extension point:

 Exception [org.eclipse.birt.report.model.metadata.ExtensionException: Message:The extension point [org.eclipse.birt.report.model.encryptionHelper] is not found. Error code:EXTENSION_POINT_NOT_FOUND 
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.metadata.ExtensionLoader.doLoad(ExtensionLoader.java:114)


I guess this is a normal behavior: define an extension but no one extends it.

Also check with model team see whether this is true.

Verified. It is true that the extension point "org.eclipse.birt.report.model.encryptionHelper" defined by Model is never implemented by any extension. 
Therefore, the metda.log figures out some exceptions. Well, the exceptions won't break the tomcat to go through and run.

traces.message: Message:The extension point [org.eclipse.birt.report.model.encryptionHelper] is not found. Error code:EXTENSION_POINT_NOT_FOUND
